divs: Sighting Detailswas outside after dark @ 9:50 general Stargazing. Just caught corner of eye ... 5 objects in V-formation. Was almost ready to dismiss as birds but they would have needed to be at treetop level to exhibit that kind of apparent speed. Not emitting any light... really seemed like aircraft wing structure but dead silent. dull grey illumination from some area high power flood lights. Estimated 500 to 1k ft. So just throwing this out there in case other similar sighting. Only tracked for about 3 seconds before trees obstructed view, but enough time to think 'oh a formations of birds' to 'those are no birds...'
Summary: 5 objects in V-formation... seemed too fast for birds... some resem to aircraft but dead silent
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Bay Village
There were no other sightings in Bay Village on or around August 6th 2012
